Module fr.cyu
Package fr.cyu.chromatynk.draw

Interface Cursor

All Known Implementing Classes:
AxialMirroredCursor, CentralMirroredCursor, DuplicatedCursor, MimickedCursor, TangibleCursor
public interface Cursor
A cursor/pencil.

      void drawLineAt(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics, double x, double y, double dx, double dy)
      Draw a line with this cursor.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      x - the starting X coordinate of the line
      y - the starting Y coordinate of the line
      dx - the ending X coordinate of the line
      dy - the ending Y coordinate of the line

    • drawAt

      void drawAt(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics, double x, double y, double dirX, double dirY)
      Draw this cursor.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      x - the X coordinate of the rendered cursor
      y - the Y coordinate of the rendered cursor
      dirX - the direction X of the rendered cursor
      dirY - the direction Y of the rendered cursor

    • move

      default void move(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics, double dx, double dy)
      Move this cursor to another position, tracing a line between the starting and ending positions.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      dx - the ending relative X coordinate of the line
      dy - the ending relative Y coordinate of the line

    • move

      default void move(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics, double distance)
      Move this cursor on the given distance, following its current direction and tracing a line between the starting and ending positions.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the graphics context to draw on
      distance - the distance to travel

    • turn

      default void turn(double degrees)
      Rotate this cursor according to the given angle.
      Parameters:
      degrees - the rotation angle in degrees in clock direction

    • copyTangible

      default Cursor copyTangible()
      Copy this cursor to a new tangible one.
      Returns:
      a new TangibleCursor with a snapshot of this cursor's data
